entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `dotnet add package` is too verbose #31946
  • Follow up on failing WASM AOT tests #31491
  • [8.0 preview 3] NuGet package validation fails when UseArtifactsOutput=true #31882
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet --info hitting /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found on Latest net8.0 #31893
  • GenAPI produces incorrect explicit interface implementations with new keyword #31774

Updated

  • Application executable is not marked as Windows 10 compatible in the default manifest #12904
    Backlog
  • [GenAPI] setup the Simplifier to produce fully qualified type names. #30538
  • GenAPI can generate ambiguous call to base constructor #31655
  • Better support for non-standard `$(Configuration)` names #31918

PullRequests

Created

  • #30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change #31957
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use 'artifacts' instead of `.artifacts` for default artifacts path #31955
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Change the workloads txt file name to KnownWorkloadManifests.txt. #31949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix TFM path for Test CLI package #31945
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Unnecessary Check In RazorSourceGenerator Targets #31921
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable Blazor AoT tests #31941
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix outer build artifacts output path #31919
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Invoke MakeDir task before invoking Touch task #31906
    untriaged

Updated

  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
